title: Basic html number input test
description: A basic html number input test.

chrome.notes: said "press up arrow" and "press down arrow"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

chrome.output: "your favorite number, edit, spinbox, 11, to set the value use the arrow keys or type the value"
in list of form fields as "Your favorite number? edit, 11"

ie.output: "edit, 11, your favorite number, edit 11, type in text"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

ie.output: "your favorite number, edit, type in text"
in list of form fields as "Your favorite number? edit, 11"
value was not incremented or decremented

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

firefox.output: "your favorite number, edit, spinbox, 11, to set the value use the arrow keys or type the value"
in list of form fields as "Your favorite number? edit, 11"
value was incremented and decremented on first key press, but switched to reading mode on the second keypress

edge.output: "Your favorite number, number, 11, minimum zero, and maximum zero, 11."
"your favorite number, number, 11, minimum zero, and maximum zero, your favorite number, number, 11, minimum zero, and maxiumum zero, 11 selected, scan."
"your favorite number, number, 11, minimum zero, and maximum zero."
value was not incremented and decremented

chrome.output: "your favorite number, spin button, editable, selected 11"
in list of form controls as "11; spin button; editable"

firefox.output: "your favorite number, spin button, edit, selected, 11"
in list of form controls as "unlabeled; edit; 11"

and_chr.output: "11, spin button, your favorite number? end of field"

ios_saf.output: "your favorite number? 11, text field, double tap to edit."
"Your favorite number? 11, text field, double tab to edit"

safari.output: "11, contents selected, your favorite number? incrementable edit text"
"11, contents selected, your favorite number? incrementable edit text"
"11, contents selected, your favorite number? incrementable edit text"
in list of form controls as "11 your favorite number? incrementable edit text"

firefox.output: "your favorite number, clickable. your favorite number, entry, 11"

results.notes: number input also conveyed by buttons to increment and decrement

firefox.output: in list of form controls as "; entry; 11"

chrome.output: role was flagged with a number

edge.output: role was flagged with a number
